32#ifndef _LINUX_DMA_MAPPING_H_
33#define _LINUX_DMA_MAPPING_H_
34
35#include <sys/bus.h>
36
37typedef bus_addr_t dma_addr_t;
38
39static inline uintmax_t
40DMA_BIT_MASK(unsigned nbits)
41{
42
43 return ~(~(uintmax_t)0 << nbits);
44}
45
46#endif /* _LINUX_DMA_MAPPING_H_ */
47
